title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Creating the time and space for quiet contemplation today could bring significant relief. However, pinpointing why you feel a certain heaviness may be impossible until you step away from the noise of everyday distractions. Keep in mind there might not be an actual event during the day that agitates your strong emotions. But the moody Moon in your sign forms a weighty opposition to somber Saturn, prompting you to reflect on more ponderous matters now. Listen to the inner voice within. Author Deepak Chopra wrote, In the silence you hear the truth and know the solutions. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
